text:
any of the following:High blood pressure (hypertension), diabetes, breathlessness on exertion, palpitations 
(heart disease), chronic cough, blood in the sputum, prolonged fever (tuberculosis), renal disease, thyroid 
dysfunction (Hypothyroidism and Hyperthyroidism) or any previous thyroid surgery, convulsions (epilepsy), 
18
attacks of breathlessness or asthma, jaundice, malaria and any other illnesses, e.g., Reproductive Tract 
Infection (RTI), Sexually Transmitted Infection(STI) and HIV/AIDS
